items.title: How I Built A $1M/Year Business - And Helped My Parents Retire

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Tuan Le emigrated from Vietnam to Toronto in 2015 and vowed at 15 to help his parents retire. Ten years later his social video production company, ShortsCut, brings in over $1 million USD annually, and he now pays his parents' rent and living expenses.

takeaways: A social video production company reaching over $1M/year shows digital media firms can be commercially significant customers for infrastructure providers.
